name: Dove X2 [Game Jam]
description:
You are a young Dove who's fallen in love but to reach your mate you have to get through the park during the busiest time of the year! Dodge Tennis Balls, Boomerangs and Frisbees to reach your mate!

Based on old NES titles where all you had to do was dodge incoming enemies and reach the goal.

  • Hand drawn pixel animations/graphics.
  • Short 2 minute gameplay loop.
  • Sound and music.
  • Press ESC to quit.
  • No menus.
  • Arrow keys to move.
  • BIRDS!

A simple game made during a Game-Jam based on the "12 days of christmas" song, everyone was given a number based on the days of the song, I got day "2" which was "Two turtle doves" in the song.

I didn't want to lock the game in as just a christmas game though so it's up to the player when the game takes place.

Music from Uppbeat (free for Creators!):
https://uppbeat.io/t/hartzmann/clear-sky
License code: NVFDTSZQG0EQDTXK
